nodes.speaker: Lily
nodes.text: Hey... can I bother you? I have to give a presentation tomorrow and I'm really nervous.

nodes.speaker: Player
nodes.text: Do you want help practicing, or some tips to calm down?

choices.text: Give her breathing and focus tips, then encourage her.
Tell her it's probably fine and she'll be okay.

nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: You run through the slides with Lily and give gentle feedback. Her voice grows steadier.

nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: You show her two breathing exercises and how to anchor with a confident posture. She thanks you and smiles faintly.

nodes.speaker: Narrator
nodes.text: Your reassurance helps, but Lily still seems uncertain — still, she nods appreciatively.

nodes.speaker: Lily
nodes.text: Thank you — I feel a lot better. I'll try the breathing first thing tomorrow.
